name: Shrouded Citadel
description:
Shrouded Citadel is an Augmented Reality dungeon adventure that you physically move through. Unique traps and puzzles await you on every floor with a variety of obstacles intent on stopping you. While inside, you'll discover entities which will try to help you and others attempting to prevent your escape. Upon entering you'll discover a plasma cannon that will give you access to puzzles and the means to defend yourself. It will pack a punch but you should choose your shots carefully, especially when a looming presence confronts you.

Shrouded Citadel does not require an internet connection to play. Does not record audio or video.
